Detailed Description

Header file that exposes the public interface of the BGP Stream Address Sets.

There is one set for each bgpstream_addr type (Storage, IPv4 and IPv6).

Author
Chiara Orsini

Definition in file bgpstream_utils_addr_set.h.

int bgpstream_ipv4_addr_set_insert ( bgpstream_ipv4_addr_set_t *  set,
bgpstream_ipv4_addr_t *  addr 
)

Insert a new address into the given set.

Parameters
setpointer to the address set
addraddress to insert in the set
Returns
1 if the address was inserted, 0 if it already existed, -1 if an error occurred

This function takes a copy of the address before it is inserted in the set.
